articles.title: RJD leader slams Shastri over ‘pagal’ remark: ‘This Baba is abusing Biharis’ - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Dhirendra Shastri, popularly known as ‘Bageshwar Baba’, arrived in Patna on May 13 for holding a five-day congregation. | Latest News India
articles.content: Rashtriya Janata Dal (RJD) leader Tej Pratap Yadav on Tuesday hit out at preacher Dhirendra Shastri alleging that he abused Biharis by calling them pagal, or mad. When asked for his comments on Dhire… [+1921 chars]
